Name: Mutton Biryani
Description: Authentic Mutton Biryani with aromatic Basmati rice and a blend of traditional spices.

Name: Egg Fried Rice
Description: Flavorful Egg Fried Rice prepared with seasoned vegetables and Indian spices.

Name: Shrimp Biryani
Description: Succulent shrimp layered with fragrant Basmati rice and aromatic spices in this delightful Biryani.

Name: Mushroom Biryani
Description: A vegetarian delight, Mushroom Biryani is a blend of mushrooms, basmati rice, and exotic spices.

Name: Vegetable Pulao
Description: Fragrant and colorful Vegetable Pulao with a mix of seasonal vegetables and aromatic basmati rice.

Name: Fish Tikka
Description: Marinated fish pieces grilled to perfection, a delightful starter for seafood lovers.

Name: Garlic Prawns
Description: Juicy prawns infused with garlic flavor, a tantalizing starter for seafood enthusiasts.

Name: Crispy Corn
Description: Crispy and spicy corn kernels, a perfect vegetarian starter for crunch lovers.

Name: Chicken Wings
Description: Succulent chicken wings with a flavorful marinade, a classic choice for a hearty starter.

Name: Bruschetta
Description: Toasted bread topped with diced tomatoes, garlic, and herbs, a light and tasty Italian starter.

Name: Margherita Pizza
Description: Classic Margherita pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil, a timeless favorite.

Name: Pepperoni Pizza
Description: Savory Pepperoni Pizza with a generous topping of pepperoni slices, a meat lover's delight.

Name: Vegetarian Supreme Pizza
Description: A veggie lover's dream, loaded with a variety of colorful and flavorful vegetables.

Name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
Description: Smokey BBQ Chicken Pizza with tender chicken pieces and a rich barbecue sauce.

Name: Hawaiian Pizza
Description: A tropical twist with ham and pineapple, creating a sweet and savory combination.

Name: Chocolate Brownie
Description: Decadent chocolate brownie served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream, a delightful dessert.

Name: Mango Cheesecake
Description: Creamy mango-flavored cheesecake, a refreshing and indulgent way to end your meal.

Name: Fruit Salad
Description: A healthy and colorful mix of fresh fruits, a light and refreshing dessert option.

Name: Gulab Jamun
Description: Soft and spongy dumplings soaked in sugar syrup, a classic Indian sweet treat.

Name: Tiramisu
Description: Layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream, a delightful Italian dessert.
